conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and supportive footwear for walking and workouts. within my expected price range: [47.4, 51.53]

Based on your budget range, I recommend the <ALEADER Women's Modern> (B07JJPBLMR) priced at $29.99. This shoe is comfortable and suitable for walking and workouts. If you decide to purchase this item, I also recommend considering the <potentially purchasable candidate>.
I need ["Clothing Shoes & Jewelry", "Men", "Shoes", "Athletic"] category products.

Based on your budget range, I recommend the <ALEADER Women's Modern> (B07JJPBLMR) priced at $29.99. This shoe is comfortable and suitable for walking and workouts. If you decide to purchase this item, I also recommend considering the <Propet Women's W0089 Pedic Walker Sandal> (B000CQE22E) priced at $93.95. This sandal ensures ultra-comfort and great support for your feet.
I'm interested in the <Propet Women's W0089 Pedic Walker Sandal> (B000CQE22E) you mentioned. Can you provide more details about its comfort and support features for walking and workouts?

The <ALEADER Women's Modern> (B07JJPBLMR) priced at $29.99 is a great choice for comfortable and supportive footwear for walking and workouts within your budget range. If you decide to purchase this item, I also recommend considering the <Propet Women's W0089 Pedic Walker Sandal> (B000CQE22E) priced at $93.95. The sandal features a leather upper with dual hook-and-loop straps, engineered for superior comfort, extra-volume construction for a relaxed fit, padded collar, and an extended heel counter for all-day support. The removable Poliyou air insole provides cushioning and moisture absorption, ensuring ultra-comfort and great support for your feet during activities like walking and workouts.
